alert.note: Alert for Cass (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 9:10AM EST until January 24 at 4:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST /3 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate to occasional heavy snow will continue through this afternoon. The heaviest snow will fall along and north of US 30. With increasing winds...blowing and drifting snow will be possible especially in rural areas. Total snow accumulation 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...From 6 AM EST /5 AM CST/ to 4 PM EST /3 PM CST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Roads in rural areas may become drifted with occasional whiteout conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
